citations.narrative:
* A facility inspection conducted on 26 Sept 2024 showed one serval in the animal count. Servals are an exotic or wild
felid. The license currently active for this facility does not include the use of exotic or wild felids. The authorized use of
certain species ensures that the facility is prepared to be compliant with their care. The licensee must obtain a new
license before using any animals beyond the types or numbers of animals authorized under the existing license. Correct
by 10/14/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(2)(ii) 
   
Requirements and application 
* A facility inspection conducted on 26 Sept 2024 showed one serval in the animal count. Servals are an exotic or wild 
felid. The license currently active for this facility does not include the use of exotic or wild felids. The authorized use of 
certain species ensures that the facility is prepared to be compliant with their care. The licensee must obtain a new 
license before using any animals beyond the types or numbers of animals authorized under the existing license. Correct 
by 10/14/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
